Description: An exciting platformer in the style of old school.
After the unexpected teleport to another dimension of the spacecraft team of 6 people lost in zakromkah space.
By controlling the captain, you must find and rescue his team. After that you have to go for that - words to describe the complex.
The level of absurdity at times surpasses the obstacles, but the ability to manipulate gravity can work wonders ...
